org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.operations

Interface RowWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccumuloWriter, AccumuloDataIndexWriter, AccumuloWriter, CassandraWriter, DefaultDataIndexRowWriterWrapper, DynamoDBWriter, FileSystemDataIndexWriter, FileSystemWriter, HBaseDataIndexWriter, HBaseWriter, KuduWriter, RedisDataIndexWriter, RedisWriter, RockDBDataIndexWriter, RocksDBWriter

    public interface RowWriter
extends AutoCloseable
    This interface is returned by DataStoreOperations and useful for general purpose writing of entries. The default implementation of AccumuloOperations will wrap this interface with a BatchWriter but can be overridden for other mechanisms to write the data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush()
      Flush the writer, committing all pending writes.
      void write(GeoWaveRow row)
      Write a GeoWave row to the DB.
      void write(GeoWaveRow[] rows)
      Write multiple GeoWave rows to the DB.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(GeoWaveRow[] rows)
        Write multiple GeoWave rows to the DB. Preconditions:
        • The writer is not closed
        Parameters:
        rows - The array of rows to be written.

      • write

        void write(GeoWaveRow row)
        Write a GeoWave row to the DB. Preconditions:
        • The writer is not closed
        Parameters:
        row - The row to be written.

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flush the writer, committing all pending writes. Note that the writes may already be committed - this method just establishes that they *must* be committed after the method returns. Preconditions:
        • The writer is not closed
